name: Surprise Maneuver
description: Your maneuvers are devastating against disadvantaged foes.
prerequisites: Combat Expertise; sneak attack +3d6 or studied strike +3d6
benefit: If you have sneak attack, when you attempt a combat maneuver check against a creature that you are flanking or that is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC against your attack, you gain a bonus on the combat maneuver check thatâ€™s equal to the number of sneak attack dice you roll.
